sentence.Network_en: The profundity of this book is achieved with breathtaking lightness.

sentence.Network_cn: 他缺乏深度和分析的精确性。

sentence.Network_en: He impressed his audience by the profundity of his knowledge.
sentence.Network_cn: 他知识渊博给听众留下了深刻的印象.

list.abs: communities in littoral zone 沿岸生物群落communities in the profundal zone 深水带生物群落-

...al zone)，阳光能穿透到底，常有有根植物生长，包括沉水植物、浮水植物、挺水植物等亚带，并逐渐过渡为陆生群落。离岸到远处的水体可分为上面的湖沼带(limnetic zone)和下层的深底带(profundal zone)。湖沼带有阳光透入，能有效地进行光合作用，有丰富的浮游植物，主要是硅藻、绿藻和蓝藻。深底带由于没有光线，自养生物不能生存，消费者生物的食物依赖于沿岸带和湖沼带下沉的食物颗粒。因此湖泊.
下层的深底带(profundal zone) 。湖沼带有阳光透入，能有效地进行光合作用，有丰富的浮游植物，主要是硅藻、绿藻和蓝藻。

entry.def: Profundity is great intellectual depth and understanding.

example.ex: The profundity of this book is achieved with breathtaking lightness.

entry.tran: （情感、经历、变化等的）深厚，深刻，深切
entry.def: If you refer to the profundity of a feeling, experience, or change, you mean that it is deep, powerful, or serious.

example.ex: ...the profundity of the structural problems besetting the country.
example.tran: 困扰这个国家的严重的结构性问题

entry.tran: 深刻的话语；深奥的话语
entry.def: A profundity is a remark that shows great intellectual depth and understanding.

example.ex: His work is full of profundities and asides concerning the human condition.
example.tran: 他的作品充满了有关人类境况的深邃见解和话外音。

means.word_mean: 1. wisdom that is recondite and abstruse and profound;

sentences.sentence: "the anthropologist was impressed by the reconditeness of the native proverbs"

means.word_mean: 2. intellectual depth; penetrating knowledge; keen insight; etc;
3. the intellectual ability to penetrate deeply into ideas
4. the quality of being physically deep;

sentences.sentence: "the profundity of the mine was almost a mile"

auth_sentence.content: I gave up on profundity and tried writing honestly.

sentences.en: He pretended profundity by eye-beamings at people.
sentences.cn: 他用神采奕奕的眼光看着人们，故作深沉。

sentences.en: He impressed his audience by the profundity of his knowledge.
sentences.cn: 他知识渊博给听众留下了深刻的印象。
